scripts.pr:ge: cd packages/shared && npx prisma generate --generator client1 --generator client2 --generator client3 && cd ../.. && pnpm dtos
scripts.pr:mi: cd packages/shared && npx prisma migrate dev --name dev && cd ../..
scripts.pr:st: cd packages/shared && npx prisma studio && cd ../..
scripts.pr:pu: cd packages/shared && npx prisma db push && cd ../..
scripts.dev: pnpm prisma:generate && pnpm prisma:migrate && pnpm prisma:push && pnpm backend:dev && pnpm frontend:dev
